booking.title: Book your next trip in 3 easy steps
booking.step1_desc: Choose your favourite place. No matter where you travel inside the World.
booking.step2_desc: After finding your perfect spot, make your payment easily and securely.
booking.step3_desc: Lastly, you have to arrive at the airport on time and enjoy the vacation.

info.explore_title: Exploring the World, One Destination at a Time with Us

hero.hallstatt_text: Visit Hallstatt, Austria, a beautiful village by a clear lake, surrounded by tall mountains.
hero.paris_text: Explore Paris, the City of Light, known for its romance and famous landmarks like the Eiffel Tower.
hero.amsterdam_text: Discover Amsterdam, a city full of canals, bicycles, and culture.
hero.kyoto_text: Travel to Kyoto, Japan, a city rich in tradition and beauty.

footer.company_desc: Discover the world with us. We create unforgettable travel experiences that connect you with amazing destinations and cultures.
footer.address: 2055 Niagara Falls Blvd, Amherst NY 14228, United States
footer.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for travel tips and exclusive offers.

packageDetails.mostSurrealPlacesBangladesh: What are the most surreal places to visit in Bangladesh?
packageDetails.faqAnswer: Some of the strangest places on earth are also the most sublime: from the UFO-like dragon's blood trees in Yemen to a rainbow-colored hot spring in Yellowstone to a bridge in Germany that looks like a leftover prop from Lord of the Rings.
